channel.title: Make an NPC Send a message when attacked {Czar}
channel.description: How would you make it so that when you attack an npc, it sends you a message like sendMessage ("It Drains your Health") or something like that.

item.title: Make an NPC Send a message when attacked {Czar}

item.description:
@daygen4545 wrote:

How would you make it so that when you attack an npc, it sends you a message like sendMessage (“It Drains your Health”) or something like that.
